revised_title: Observations on Human Generation and Coral Formation
tldr: The author discusses observations on human generation, including the placenta, membranes, and blood flow in a fetus. They also explore coral formation, asserting that corals are minerals rather than petrified berries. The author shares various preparations and solutions made from corals and may-dew, as well as their medicinal properties.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Reproduction
